ModMetaData.name: Ratkin and Facial Stuff Compatibility Patch
ModMetaData.author: BulletDelivery
ModMetaData.description:
Compatibility patch between Ratkin and Facial Stuff mod. Make sure to load the mods in the following order: - Hugslib - Facial stuff and Humanoid Alien Races 2.0 (Order of these two does not matter) - Alien Faces Expanded - New Ratkin Plus - This mod
To-do: - Add animation for eye and mouth - Fix slight misaligment of ears when facing south and north
